column5: To all our friends south of the border... enjoy the celebrations and have a great day!  Maureen
Yup, all the best to y'all down there !!
Hope  the 'Sudden' contingency is enjoying the day. I for one am thankful that you are our neighbours.  your friend, John Hancock.

Well we got the best neighbors to the north Roy.  I'm soon to be getting ready for a big family picnic at a cabin in the mountains today.  Cook out, lots of food, hiking, and lots of good stuff planned for the day.  Dang - on the road for work tomorrow.  10 days to Ontario Fishing Trip #2 for some bass.
Thanks a bunch Mo, Lew, and Roy!!!  I've got a nice hunk of beef to do on the grill today, other than that I'm just gonna relax a little.  Back to work tomorrow. (sux)
Thanks all for the well wishes. We will have a nice BBQ this afternoon and then watch as the local rednecks combine alcohol and gunpowder for our entertainment.   signed  "8 fingered Art"
Thanks! I decided to work today and bank a day off later for a long weekend of fishing.   Whopper
